text: Sanyo is a Japanese electronics company. They specialise in home appliances. == Overview == Sanyo was founded in 1947 by Toshio Iue. Panasonic acquired it in 2011. As of 2018, the company's revenue was Â¥84.678 billion. == Other websites == Sanyo on Panasonic website == References == Category:Technology companies of Japan Category:Electronics companies of Japan
